If you don't like what they're doing break up then find yourself another person. If you're being threatened and you have the time to cheat I think you should be using that time to get the police or at least friends/family. Cheating is bad, don't cheat. Also playing on your friend/partner's insecurities is also bad. You may think it's funny but trust me, they don't. If they have the confidence they'll eventually tell you outright to stop it, if they don't have confidence they'll slowly start to distance from you. To the point that you're not friends anymore.

@Tyleron The Animus and Anima are psychoanalytic archetypes. The [masculine] in the woman is the Animus and the [feminine] in the man is the Anima. Such archetypes are fantasies that individuals have and that they project onto another person. For example, a woman who projects a [father figure] onto her lover. The problem with Jung's archetypes is that they are a model of his time. Unlike your opinion, I no longer believe that such archetypes are easily distinguishable in our contemporary society. On the contrary, I believe that such archetypes should currently be reconsidered and redefined since it is not possible to speak of something [masculine] or [feminine] as properly corresponding to a gender. Not even on a social level anymore.

I like two things about this manga. First, the boy acts realistic for a virgin; awkward, but not afraid of pussy. And second, the girl doesn't act like the usual braindead bimbo that we see in NTR. A boyfriend "joking" about where his girlfriend is lacking happens more often than you think in real life, and those girls are deeply hurt by it. Girls can be vindictive too, you know? If this was some other NTR, the girl would just take the boyfriend's shit quietly like a good little girl before getting raped in some alley and enjoying it because "Oh my god~ I'm a fictional woman with no brains~" This one, however, is aware of her own desire to feel appreciated. If you think the boyfriend was just "teasing" her, you're incredibly immature. Switch the genders and ask yourself how it would feel to get "teased" about something out of your control, like your height or your dick size. Yeah, feels kinda shitty, doesn't it? Great manga.
